column3: If osx build breaks here, see #11995.

I would be surprised if this works without changing the qt patches...

just started a depends (gtitian) build: https://bitcoin.jonasschnelli.ch/build/474

@jonasschnelli I see: https://github.com/thijstriemstra/bitcoin/tree/patch-1/depends/patches/qt\n\nAny documentation/pointers why/how these were created? And when they can be dropped? Are there tests that fail without these? I guess we'll see..

> I would be surprised if this works without changing the qt patches...\n\nYeah, build failed with that, I'll take a look at updating the patches: https://travis-ci.org/bitcoin/bitcoin/jobs/335765496#L529
Thanks for starting this, but the changes are likely to be more involved. Closing for now.
